member.name: M:WizardWrx.WebApplicationAids.ConfigFileReaders.GetConnectionStringFromWebConfig(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get the connection string identified by name by string from the official connectionStrings section of the web.config file specified by the relative or absolute file named in string .
member.param: This string must be either an absolute (fully qualified) file name or a name that is valid relative to the current working directory.
This string must contain the "name" property of a node in the connectionStrings section of a well-formed web.config file.

returns.para: If it succeeds, the return value is a ConnectionStringSettings object that has valid name and connectionString properties. Otherwise, the return value is NULL.
Its providerName property may have a value, or it may be null.
Regardless, the returned ConnectionStringSettings object can be treated as if it had been read from a web.config file in the usual way.

member.remarks: This method works by treating the web.config file as a standard XML document.
